jenes.utils.multitasking

Class MultiThreadEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • jenes.utils.multitasking.Runner
      • jenes.utils.multitasking.MultiThreadRunner
        • jenes.utils.multitasking.MultiThreadEvaluator

  • public class MultiThreadEvaluator
extends MultiThreadRunner
    This class represent a simple implementation of a multi thread runner
    Since:
    2.0
    See Also:
    MultiThreadRunner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MultiThreadEvaluator()
      Default constructor that generates an execution enviroinment with a number of threads equals to the number of phisical cores.
      MultiThreadEvaluator(int nthreads)
      Default constructor that define the thread number to use

      Call-back invoked soon before the Population evaluation starts using the default Fitness defined per GeneticAlgorithm

      Call-back invoked soon after the evaluation phase has been performed.

        Description copied from class: Runner
        Call-back invoked soon before the Population evaluation starts using the default Fitness defined per GeneticAlgorithm
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        pop - the population that will be evaluated

      • onEvaluationEnd

        public void onEvaluationEnd()
        Description copied from class: Runner
        Call-back invoked soon after the evaluation phase has been performed.
        WARNING: the method is called before the elapsed time per evaluation is computed so a huge work could affect measurements.
        Overrides:
        onEvaluationEnd in class Runner
